title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Dan Shaughnessy on Bill Russell, Steelers + Bills Camp w/ Tyler Dunne, Divisional Futures w/ Chad Millman
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Dan Shaughnessy on Bill Russell, Steelers + Bills Camp w/ Tyler Dunne, Divisional Futures w/ Chad Millman
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, (3:00) Colin reacts to Deshaun Watson’s 6-game suspension, if it’s in Roger Goodell’s best interest to appeal the decision and seek additional games, and why the Padres got hyper-aggressive like the Yankees or Dodgers to land superstar Juan Soto.

Then, longtime Boston Globe Writer Dan Shaughnessy reacts to the passing of Celtics legend Bill Russell (12:00), and looks back on his rivalry with Wilt (16:00). He also tries to make sense of Bill Belichick seemingly prepared to enter the season with Matt Patricia as OC.

Then, NFL Reporter - and GoLongTD Founder - Tyler Dunne joins Colin to discuss the expectations for Aaron Rodgers without Davante Adams, if Rodgers will finish out his new contract in Green Bay if the Steelers can compete in the AFC North with Mitchell Trubisky or rookie Kenny Pickett, if the Bills are Super Bowl favorites and if Sean McDermott could find himself on the hot seat if Buffalo can’t take the next step.

Finally, the Action Network's Chad Millman covers the best and worst Divisional futures for the AFC East, AFC North, AFC West, and the NFC North.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
